food.question: I am round and juicy, and often red. You take a big bite and crunch away!

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on trees.
🍎 Snow White loved me (maybe a little too much!).
🥧 You can make a pie with me.

food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me!

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm places.
💪 Eating me can give you energy.
🥣 You can slice me up into your cereal.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal.

hints.text: 🥛 Kittens drink me when they are young.
🦴 I am good for your bones because of calcium.
🍪 I taste yummy with cookies!

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me!

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
👁️ People say I'm good for your eyesight.
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that comes in many flavors. I'm often eaten on a cone.

hints.text: ☀️ I'm perfect on a hot day.
👅 I can make your tongue different colors.
🍨 You can put sprinkles on me.

food.question: I am small, round and green. I am often in salads.

hints.text: 🌿 I grow on vines.
🐻 Sometimes bears like to eat me.
🥤I can be used to make juice.

food.question: I am made from flour, water and yeast and baked in the oven. You can make a sandwich with me.

hints.text: 🍞 I am often brown or white.
🥪 You can put butter and jam on me.
🔥 I need to be cooked to be edible

food.question: I am a type of bean that is often used to make a chocolate treat.

hints.text: 🍫 I am grown in warm countries.
🌳 I grow on trees in pods.
🌎 My name sounds similar to a popular drink.

food.question: I am a small, round food that grows in a shell. Squirrels love to bury me.

hints.text: 🌰 I grow on trees in the autumn.
🐿️ I am a favorite food for squirrels.
🔨 You sometimes need to crack me open to eat me.

food.question: I am a dairy product made from milk, but I'm not ice cream. I can be hard or soft, and often have holes.

hints.text: 🧀 Mice are often shown eating me.
🍕 I am often melted on pizza.
🐄 I am made from the milk of a cow.
